## LightModel.calculateTexCoord() method

Calculates the texture coordinate of current fragment by given texture coordinate index

**Signature:**

```typescript
calculateTexCoord(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, index: number): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | The shader scope |
|  index | number | The texture coordinate index |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The texture coordinate
